snippet.title: Per Aspera trailer - PC Gaming Show 2019
snippet.description:
Per Aspera is a base-building strategy game where you try to terraform Mars. It will be releasing some time in 2020.

For more information, head here: https://www.pcgamer.com/per-aspera-game-trailer/
